en.page_subtitle: Try the entire platform free for 7 days, without a credit card.
en.core_subscription_description: Everything you need to create, manage, and scale your processes.
en.white_label_description: Customize the platform with your own brand identity.
en.enterprise_licenses_description: For larger organizations needing custom solutions and dedicated support.
en.discounted_licenses_description: We offer 50% off for non-profits, educational institutions, students, teachers, and open-source projects.
en.testimonial_1: Blue just helps keep things completely organised â€” it's an absolutely wonderful tool.
en.testimonial_2: If you're wondering if you should buy Blue...the answer is YES.
en.testimonial_3: My entire life is in Blue! I love how fantastically responsive the team is.
en.testimonial_4: Investing in Blue was one of the best business decisions I have ever made.
en.faq_why_use_answer: If you're looking for a platform that's easy to use yet powerful, with a team that is hyper-focussed on customers instead of investors, you're in the right place.
en.faq_free_trial_question: Does Blue have a free trial?
en.faq_free_trial_answer: Yes there is! You can use Blue free for 7 days without any limitations. After the 7 days are up, you'll need to add a valid credit/debit card and start paying to continue using Blue.
en.faq_monthly_yearly_question: Do you have monthly and yearly plans?
en.faq_monthly_yearly_answer: Yes, you can pay yearly and you'll get two month's off.
en.faq_payment_methods_question: What payment methods do you support?
en.faq_payment_methods_answer: We take payments exclusively via debit/credit card. All billing is handled by Stripe, our payment processing partner. We never directly handle your sensitive payment data.
en.faq_refund_policy_answer: We offer a 30-day refund policy for the first payment. Simply email us at support@blue.cc and we'll issue you a refund.
en.faq_data_ownership_question: Who owns the data uploaded to Blue?
en.faq_data_ownership_answer: The account owner retains full ownership of all data associated with their account. At Blue, we respect your privacy and do not claim any ownership over the data you add.
en.faq_based_where_answer: We're registered in Delaware, USA as "Bloo, Inc." and we have team members distributed around the world.
en.faq_building_next_answer: Head over to our Roadmap page to find out what new features are coming, and feel free to join our Community Forum if you'd like to suggest new features.
